resources.string: Tilt to steer, land on platforms, and climb the Glyph Matrix.
Guide the snake with tilt controls, eat food, and avoid collisions.
Choose a game to learn the rules and adjust tilt sensitivity.
Climb endless platforms and avoid falling off the Glyph Matrix.
Bounce upward by landing on platforms that regenerate as you ascend. Gravity constantly drags you down while the screen wraps horizontally.
Long-press the Glyph button to start, pause, or resume. Tilt left or right to move across the board and never fall beneath the camera.
Guide the snake through a circular matrix, eat food, and avoid collisions.
Navigate a round 25×25 arena where food spawns anywhere inside the lit circle. Each bite grows the snake and speeds up the loop.
Long-press the Glyph button to start, pause, or resume. Gentle horizontal tilts steer left/right, stronger vertical tilts move up/down, and touching a wall wraps you to the opposite edge.
Horizontal tilt sensitivity is shared across games. Increase it for faster moves or lower it for tighter control.
